review:
I wanted to express my heartfelt gratitude to Dr. Sangeetha who has been my gynecologist since the time i conceived.

From the first day of my visit till my delivery and even after during the follow up visits, we had an amazing experience with her by our side. She has gone over and beyond to ensure all our queries regarding pregnancy, lactation, breastfeeding are resolved by guiding us from time to time.

She is quite transparent and ensures 2 way communication, listening and understanding my issues and expectations and then providing solutions.

Even in the labour room, when i was under extreme pain, she constantly motivated me and allowed me to be myself during that difficuilt hour which speaks highly of a her as a doctor with human values.

She is not only an excellent doctor, she is superb, approachable even at the odd hours, has a friendly approach who takes care of her patients with always a smiling gesture.

I can't thank her enough for the excellent care and guidance she has provided at each stage of my pregnancy journey but i am blessed to have her as my doctor.

I will always go back to her whenever i would need any gyne support in future and would highly recommend her to all my friends and family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We went to Dr. Sangeetha for our second child. She is very friendly *** ************** She listens to you very patiently and then advises. She will counsel you in such a way that your 9 months of pregnancy will go very smooth by suggesting good diet, supplements, regular checkups and medicines required.
I would recommend Dr Sangeetha to all the new mom to be.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Seeing a gynaecologist as a single woman can be very daunting. I set up the appointment to see Dr.Sangeetha, and she was really understanding, non judgemental and patient. She did a cervix exam, a breast scan and general check up, and explained everything very patiently. Instantly putting me at ease. 
Definitely will recommend her for any Gynaecology related consultation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Vruksho Clinic is a place wherin , I got the solution for all my issues,

Dr. Sangeetha who guided me through my Gynaec Issues.

the best part with all the doctor, is that she gave time to hear me out , analysed my problems, she spent time to make me understand,  just not the solution for my problems,  but to explain to me the probable reasons for my problems...

Highly Motivating...

Really a great place... Great environment..
and Approachable .

Also Location wise , accessibility is also an added advantage....

Visited Dr Sangeeta postpartum. She is been my go to since her time in Kormangala. Consulted online and then visited her clinic for check up. She examined the sutures, counselled about exercises , shared links to start exercises which are diastasis safe and asked - How is your mood? A rare Q from Gynaec.. She guided on lactation- suggested improvements in latch and also discussed options on family planning. Personalised care and attention was given- felt seen and heard. Highly recommend Dr for those seeking personal attention. thank you Doc!

I've been going to Dr. Sangeetha since February '24, when I found out I had a large fibroid that needed to be removed. As someone who has never gone through anything like surgery or a hospital stay, and who always has a lot of questions and about all aspects of any treatment, I am grateful to have had Dr. Sangeetha's guidance and support during this time. 
I underwent a successful laproscopic myomectomy with her in May; she was  present and available in the lead up to the procedure as well as in the days after, addressing all my post-op questions as soon as they arose. In addition to being kind and open, she is very thorough and pays close attention to details. 
I will continue to go to her, and to recommend her to others as I have been doing. I wish her all the best in her practice!

I have been a patient of Dr. Sangeetha for the past 5 years now, primarily for maternity planning and consultations. During this time, I've found her ** ** ********* ************* *** approachable. She has a reassuring demeanor that immediately puts you at ease. 
She listens attentively to my concerns and always takes the time to explain things clearly.

Absolutely! Dr. Sangeetha is a fantastic gynaecologist who genuinely cares about her patients' well-being. I would recommend her to anyone looking for compassionate and thorough gynaecological care.

I consulted Dr. Sangeeta Sivaraman for my second pregnancy - I had a wonderful experience and highly recommend her. Dr. Sangeeta is not just an excellent doctor but very friendly, approachable and makes one feel very comfortable. She guided me throughout my pregnancy and it went very smooth both for me and my baby. She doesn't believe in medicines doing the trick but the person making the effort to make oneself better. She gives very honest and practical advice and also went above and beyond her duties to help me with my breastfeeding journey.
Thank you doctor for the excellent care and treatment you have given me.

context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy Exercise,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
It was a very great experience with Dr. Sangeetha Sivaraman. Right from the very start of my pregnancy she has been very supportive and helpful. She ** **** ************* *** advised me to take the right supplements and food. Her friendly nature and approach made my whole pregnancy journey a wonderful one.
She is very regular with her check-ups and on one instances she helped me detect and treat my UTI on time. I am grateful to her who has been there for me during my pregnancy time and helped me deliver a healthy baby. 
I would definitely recommend her. So, if you are about to enjoy your mommy journey, please do visit this talented doctor.  A huge shout out to this amazing doctor.

review: Very easy and comfortable to talk to.  Explained the process and way forward very clearly. Highly recommend!

Dr.Sangeetha is a wonderful doctor..very practical yet kind and understanding. She ensures her patients are comfortable especially during physical examinations. I am glad I crossed paths with her and will highly recommend her!! 

With her expertise combined with her care, you are in very safe hands!! She is also great at explaining the situation to partners or family members making it easier for everyone involved!

Dr Sangeetha is a great doctor and an amazing human being. She’s polite, sincere *** ************** She gives you the time of the day and helps explain everything and discuss all possible options. She makes you feel comfortable *** ******* **** *** *********** ***** ** *********** She’s diligent and non judgemental. Highly recommend!
Very nice Doctor, treatment is very nice and she is very friendly,she support us so much for my wife delivery time . Thank you so much Dr. Sangeetha sivaraman Ma'am 🙏

Dr. Sangeetha is an outstanding physician who combines expertise with genuine compassion. My experience under her care was nothing short of exceptional. She takes the time to listen attentively to concerns and provide thorough explanations, ensuring I felt informed and cared for throughout my treatment. Dr. Sangeetha goes above and beyond, showing a true commitment to her patients' well-being. I have complete confidence in recommending Dr. Sangeetha to friends, family, and anyone seeking a doctor who not only treats medical issues effectively but also prioritizes the holistic health and comfort of her patients.
She makes people comfortable and has a excellent communication skills. Her care and treatment is very nice.

I have been to the mention clinic  Meet Dr.Sangeetha
I am very much Satisfied with the Treatment n Care taken by Dr.. felt very comfortable n Recommendable.
We got good consultations from her at every right time and had wonderful pregnancy journey of our pregnancy with her...Thank you mam..

review: Dr. Sangeetha is a wonderful and friendly medical professional. Her approach to patient care was exemplary; she consistently checked on my progress, ensuring my recovery was smooth and any concerns were promptly addressed. Her dedication and warm demeanor made the entire experience much more comfortable and reassuring.
